section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-3ec4c9a elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.h2: Tuition-free K-12 virtual school for students across Michigan.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-74619fe elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.h2: This is the future of virtual K-12 education.

p.span: Michigan International Prep School is a forward-thinking, K-12 virtual school. We’re driven by a very simple idea: no two students are the same, and the educational pathway should should reflect that. We’re rethinking what it means to educate online. We focus on keeping our students engaged through personal connection, customization, and flexibility. You can apply here.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-06f3786 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

h2.a: A few ways to make the most of time at home during the COVID-19 crisis.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-5e3767e elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

h2.a: Virtual story time with Sen. Lana theis
In honor of Reading Month, Senator Lana Theis (chair of the Senate Education Committee) hosted a virtual story hour for MIPS students and Families.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-dd9c38e elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section
elementor-element elementor-element-7277505 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.h2: A customized learning pathway for every student.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-3ccbbfe elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section
elementor-element elementor-element-6fb0d90 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: At Michigan International Prep School, we want our student to pursue what makes them different. No two people are identical, and it doesn’t make sense to treat them like they are. That’s why we create a unique learning pathway for every MIPS learner, built around their talents, interest, location, and schedule.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-4d7368c elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section
elementor-element elementor-element-a033962 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section
elementor-element elementor-element-3b3cdef elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

p.span: MIPS students are self-directed – but they’re never alone. Our qualified mentors are here to help guide your child from enrollment to graduation. Need to speak with someone in person? Call a mentor, or drop by one of our learning labs to work with a tutor.

div.h2: To create an individualized educational pathway that incites a passion for learning, cultivates a global awareness, and prepares students for a smooth transition into the workforce.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-50d4eb7f elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

div.p: Ⓒ 2020 Michigan International Prep School - All rights reserved | *NCAA is a registered trademark of the National Collegiate Athletic Association.

div.a: Attention: School is always in session here at MIPS - we will continue to work in our courses as usual. However, to protect the health of our students and staff, all drop-in learning labs are temporarily closed effective March 13 as we monitor the COVID-19 situation. Click here to see COVID-19 guidance and MIPS impact.
